lender.name: Pumpkin and Leonardo
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate and others are not. We won the birth lottery and have everything we need and more so we should share.

lender.name: The Korce-Paul's
lender.loan_because: we love to give
lender.occupational_info: helping kids when parents cannot/building homes for rich people.

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: because it makes a difference for people that are less fortunate and it makes you feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grade 11 high school student

lender.name: Brent Jex
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful to have so many great opportunities and I think it's important to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney in San Diego, California.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: earlier in life, we experience hardship and through perserverance, faith and help from relatives, we were able to bounce back
lender.occupational_info: office work

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I like to see hard work rewarded

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: ...it makes sense. Giving KIVA gift certificates not only introduces others to this program, it truly becomes the gift that keeps giving.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want my daughter to inherit a better world, free of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur and adviser to senior executives on business development and marketing.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.occupational_info: I make computer software for biologists

lender.name: Janis Family
lender.loan_because: The Kiva program allows us to support entrepreneurs worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: Busy busy parents of Max & Zoe.

lender.name: PC Moms Play Group
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our children to be good citizens of the world
lender.occupational_info: We are all mothers working to raise caring children

lender.name: Papa & Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I do not have the means to empower anyone, but if my small loan can help someone empower themselves, then I have done the right thing. Proverbs 19:17 Whoever is generous to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will repay him for his deed.
lender.occupational_info: I am including my beautiful Granddaughter Alyssa in this endeavor with the hope to teach her that we should not take Gods gifts for granted.

lender.name: Roma
lender.loan_because: people should be able to choose their own destinies.

lender.name: debbie
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO SHARE AND ENABLE OTHERS TO PROVIDE, AND THEN BE ABLE TO SHARE TOO.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because:
I believe in people who are opportunistic and entrepreneurial, and I am inspired by individuals who refuse to let their inherited circumstances limit their livelihood.
Most importantly, I loan because I am moved by and forever grateful for Jesus Christ's captivating and ever-pursuing love.
lender.occupational_info: I work through all phases of purchasing and selling various companies.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to have a better life
lender.occupational_info: working for all the directors of the company keeps me busy 24/7.

lender.name: Kent and Sally
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Teach/write/worry/play intl chess/mess around in my too big yard.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: As a person and artist I know how hard it is to follow a dream. Therefore I sometimes wonder what the most important thing of being here on earth could be. Perhaps it is our interaction with each other... and the real meaning of life might be how we teach and learn from each other... In essence... how we treat each other, most importantly our family and close friends. Next, is how we treat everyone else that we encounter along our life’s path and I think our goal should be to have a positive impact on every person we meet... to be patient and kind, to impart our knowledge, to bring a smile to ones face and to learn from each experience.

lender.name: Tadej Brdnik
lender.loan_because: I want to help change other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm been fortunate enough in my life to have others who have helped me on my path to success so nothing gives me greater joy than to assist those who are trying to makes a difference in their own lives.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have nothing. This is a small amount of money that gives a great deal of hope to people.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: It's good karma

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I feel empowered by helping real people to make a difference in their circumstances
lender.occupational_info: I look after my husband and my children

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want people around the World to be given the opportunity to explore their dreams. As a self-employed business owner, I love to see people empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Clients to Buy and Sell homes. I represent them during the transaction, often the largest purchase of their lifetime.

lender.name: Wenefredo
lender.loan_because: i want to help more people in my country.
lender.occupational_info: i sell supplementary meds.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: i like to help people, to give them a change
lender.occupational_info: trying to set up new companies en france

lender.name: Liana
lender.loan_because: I believe small gestures can make big differences.
lender.occupational_info:
I used to live in China and do my best to research and understand why things are the way they are.
Now I live in London, doing a little bit of the same, and working with companies to help them do good things.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it is a small way of helping others to improve their lot in life. In Australia we are lucky to have a decent life. People all over the world should be able to share this. There IS enough to go around - we just need to share the resources.
lender.occupational_info: I am the carer for my disabled son. I try to give him as full a life as possible.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have what I have, and want to help others who aren't as fortunate.

lender.name: Jessica & Avery
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, and would like to pass it on.

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: I thing that is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to tap into and help facilitate the energy of people who have unfullfilled dreams and the dedication and drive to convert dreams into action
lender.occupational_info: I am actively retired. I have a small landscaping business in the summer ( one man); and in the winter I work for a ski area called Sugarbush in Vermont. I am a Outback guide. I take people outside the area boundaries and ski in the neighboring wilderness.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I simply believe that there is nothing better than the feeling you get from helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer security solutions for corporate customers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I would like to give someone a chance to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Amam
lender.loan_because: It helps others in need! =]

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: the developing world needs infrastructure beyond mult-national corporations.
lender.occupational_info: brand digital marketing

lender.name: Janell
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: se todos dermos um bocadinho, todos podemos ser um bocadinho mais felizes...

lender.name: Steve Beatty and friends
lender.loan_because: You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give. - Winston Churchill

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: sharing is empowering.

lender.name: melany
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. It's a good cause. It's very important for me and everybody should do it. It's so simple, and it can help someone have a better life. Thanks to Kiva, great initiative!

lender.name: Cheryl & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We are both entrepeneurs and recognize what an opportunity Kiva & our loans will provide to a lot of hard working people that don't have the same advantages that we have.

lender.name: Jose Maria
lender.loan_because: It became clear to me that I can make a huge impact on someone else's life by loaning a small amount of money. I also like the principle of Kiva and the fact that it promotes entrepreneurship, education, self-discipline and creativity. Two people I've never met, one in Kenya and one in Peru, will have the chance to improve their lives in a very practical way by I decision I made, one that also helped better my own life. My favorite Kiva fact: a repayment rate of 99.77% and we are talking very underprivileged applicants in what we like to call "third world countries". Amazing, uh?
lender.occupational_info: I direct operas and theater plays

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in multiple subjects between the ages of 12 and 18.

lender.name: Filipe
lender.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Douro Litoral
lender.loan_because: I belive that we can make history by ending poverty. This is a good way!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because:
This loan is to honor my daughters teachers and staff at school. Merry Christmas!!!
I know what its like to need help sometimes. If I can help just a little for someone else to have a better life, no matter who they are or where they live, WHY NOT?
lender.occupational_info: We grow fruits and veggies to sell at farmer's market and our house stand. We have some chickens for eggs to sell, and we are raising a few beef cows and pigs for ourselves.

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: With a small amount of money I can make a difference

lender.name: Kelly and Joann
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed to be successful women entrepreneurs who want to help other women less fortunate than ourselves succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We are residential interiors designers. Our job is to make homes beautiful, warm and happy - no matter what kind of home they are.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I hope my time here in this life will have a positive impact on others, most especially those less fortunate - I care deeply about Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I collect financial data.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone in need. I'm not able to do as much as I would like, but this allows me to at least do something.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the computer most of the day and attend to my home & family the rest of the day.

lender.name: doug siddall
lender.loan_because: it seems like a worthwhile business and feel that they will make a go of it.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help some people who don´t have so much possibilities like we in Germany!!
lender.occupational_info: At the moment i study tourism in Germany. After the study i want to work for development projects to help people.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: ""I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still can do something; and because I cannot do everything I will not refuse to do the somthing that I can do." ~Helen Keller"
lender.occupational_info: I am currently going to school in MN...I am a Women Studies major and a human relations minor. I love it!!

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to make a difference for someone...
lender.occupational_info: I used to be in High Tech...

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I want to do anything I can to help others who aren't able to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college working towards a degree in labor and employment relations.

lender.name: Rick & Lorina
lender.loan_because: We want the women (and men) in the world to be empowered and have chances which they deserve in life. There is nothing in life gained by selfishness and therefore we want to be able to help in a small way to improve the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Rick is a technician on Ferraris. He has been doing this for over 10 years and previous to this, he work on predominantly European cars in his home State of New York. Lorina is a Homemaker and a full time college student. Their children keep them very occupied.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have my own company that helps me support my family. This wouldn't have been possible without the assistance and encouragement I've received from others over the years. I'd like to help other people achieve the same self-reliance and ability to care for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I strategically help companies develop their visual identities, designing logos, brochures, packaging, signage, advertising, websites, etc.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is one of the best gifts you can give yourself and someone else. We are obligated as fellow humans to help one another in any way we can regardless of where we were born on the globe.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am thankful!

lender.name: the silk purse event center inc.
Mary Therese
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elke B
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around..We are all capable of helping others and being kind to people around us

lender.name: Aida
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderfull thing to make other people's dream become true
lender.occupational_info: I restaur works of art in paper (books, drawings, water colour paintings, etc)

lender.name: DGA Barrios
lender.loan_because: We also believe that we are all responsible for each other and the idea of supporting others on their way to self sustainability

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: This opportunity was given to me as a gift. It is a gift that warms the heart and keeps on giving. I plan to "pay it forward" by giving Kiva gift certificates for Christmas. To me, that is the true Spirit of Christmas...helping others that are less fortunate.

lender.name: shari
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to ride motocycles and write mortgages for people who need a break to acheive the american dream of ownign their own home

lender.name: Wallace
lender.loan_because: I like to see progress and development. I am also a strong supporter of microlending.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Dartmouth College in Hanover, New Hampshire.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: A little help from me may be a lot of help to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Writer, editor and web designer for a business trade publication.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to get a small business off the ground, and am delighted to be able to help entrepreneurs around the world to achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I design software systems that solve complex business problems

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: social worker and mental health counselor
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine knowing that lending like this was possible and not doing it.
lender.occupational_info: I meet with children who are having trouble - they can't do the things they're supposed to do, or they're always sad or always angry, or they don't know how to be friends with other children, or many other kinds of trouble - and I try to understand with them what is wrong at the root. And then, once we understand the problems better, I do what I can to help, and I teach the children to do what they can to help themselves. Sometimes I talk with their teachers or their families or anyone else who is important in their lives, so that we can all work together to make things better.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: My family and I feels it is a great learning experience for me
lender.occupational_info: I have just graduated from High School and look forward to my future.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: A group of us had dinner with Kiva co-founder Matt Flannery at Monmouth College one evening and his passion for Kiva's mission is catching! Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to help others around the world fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: CEO of a manufacturing company

lender.name: Naoya
lender.loan_because: friends help each other.
lender.occupational_info: working for a Japanese trading firm.

lender.name: Ginga
lender.loan_because: world has to be changed and at last, money is only money.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Lending to women is a way to empower them. This is very important to me. Helping others become self sufficient is a way to celebrate my good fortune and move our world away from poverty.

lender.name: Karl and Chellie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us that we could be a blessing.

lender.name: Abraham
lender.loan_because: I can! Everyone who can should, it makes things so much easier and helps people across the world become able to do the same for others.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It is only by helping that the world can become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I study human behavior in the workplace

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: I coax computers into working as intended

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: I believe Americans are sometimes too spoiled to want to help out other people, even if it is only $25.
lender.occupational_info: I forecast the weather in the US military.

lender.name: Barb & Terry
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have what I have and would like to help others prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I design the graphical look of web pages and then program the code needed to display the page on the Internet.

lender.name: Michael & Ronda
lender.loan_because: As we follow Jesus Christ, His heart for helping the poor moves us to action.

lender.name: Claudette
lender.loan_because: To help make the world a better place, and to help others do the same.

lender.name: Boots
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Student, future Minister of Health of India, revolutionary, visionary, lover of life.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world that can't help themselves.

lender.name: Paul & Phyllis
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Paul and Ana
lender.loan_because: this is such a worthy cause

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the resources to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I sell scientific instruments and equipment to medical research and academic/education laboratories for clinical, molecular and microbiological experiments.

lender.name: alexandra
lender.loan_because: I lend because i feel fortunate with what I have in my life and want to give other people a chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychology student at a university and hope to work with underprivileged children.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I live a life of countless blessings and look for ways to pass those on. Kiva makes the world a smaller place in a very good way, giving us all an opportunity to give and receive.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes and realize their dreams. And I make a lot of new friends along the way.

lender.name: Tony and Juanita
lender.loan_because: we want to help those who have the desire to help themselves.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I want my kids to know that you can make a difference in the world by contributing what you can, when you can with an open heart and an open mind.
lender.occupational_info: Being the mother of four children is my dream job - it's exhausting and enormously satisfying.

lender.name: José Pedro Vasconcelos
lender.loan_because: " Só os peixes mortos nadam a favor da corrente" P. Manh

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner and want to support people to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I train people to become trainers; and train associates in become better employees. As well, I am a volunteer advocate and career counsellor for international people moving to Canada.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe one can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan for retirement

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I want to join the fight to help stop poverty around the world. I see this as the best way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am currently deployed to Iraq. I am a Medic, and I work in the Emergency Room at a Hospital. I help take care of sick and injured soldiers, local nationals, and civilians.

lender.name: Ernesto
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Advertising

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Microfinance allows people around the world to build a business that could sustain them for years to come.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher in a very small, democratic school which honors and nurtures children's natural curiosity and development.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: The best thing to do with money is to spread it around to make more.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a veterinarian who sees pets in their homes. I talk to the owners and arrange visit times. Also I am responsible for accounts and some record keeping. My children are grown but I keep in touch with them and sometimes watch my grandchildren.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in this world and I think that we can all grow, learn and achieve anything when we give!
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 3 incredible children and I stay home and take care of them.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being connected to people all over the world, and I understand from my time in Peace Corps Bolivia that sometimes it only takes something small to really help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I do home visits with low income spanish-speaking families and help them learn about health, parenting, self-esteem, and other resources available to them in the community.

lender.name: Darlene R.
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to receive many blessings in my life, and I want to share them with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a wonderful group of people in a successful company that constructs office buildings in Arizona, in the Southwest United States.

lender.name: Jacki
lender.loan_because: My parents were small business owners, and now I am too. They taught me that it's important to share your success with others. My dad has everything in the world, so I thought a gift certificate to Kiva would make a meaningful Christmas present.
lender.occupational_info: I write advertisements to help companies sell their products. I also have a small greeting card company

lender.name: Mary Grace
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: I am retired -- but we spend a lot of time on our boat visiting the islands and places of the great Northwest.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves all of us.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I'm impressed, amazed, and inspired by the entrepreneurs I read about on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school students- ages 12-15. It is the best job for me. I smile and enjoy going to work everyday.

lender.name: Thackers and spouses
lender.loan_because: This is a Christmas gift in the name of my family and spouses.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mobile phone software company.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: The Golden Rule. I would hope that someone would do the same for me if I needed help.

lender.name: The Scott Family
lender.loan_because: The concept of 'eternal' micro loans is amazing and we couldn't wait to be a part of it.

lender.name: Laiko
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurism helps communuities.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help businesses prosper.

lender.name: Suzee
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell things

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to help people improve their future and that of their children.

lender.name: Dani
lender.loan_because: capitalism rules!

lender.name: Marni
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and wish to share with people who are trying to carve out a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to shine a little light into the darker corners of the world by what I do, say and write.

lender.name: Perk & Jody
lender.loan_because: Through hard work and just plain luck being born in a land of plenty we are fortunate and want to advance the opportunity to others.
lender.occupational_info: Perk- I have been a tennis professional for 30 years and Jody manages healthcare services.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It is a small way that I can share my blessings.

lender.name: J&B family
lender.loan_because: We hope that by making small micro loans we can help empower people and change lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of two students, a photographer, and a director of a non-profit community land trust.

lender.name: Alison
lender.occupational_info: I teach technology related courses to people from around the world and they inspire me to give.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to assist people that need it.
lender.occupational_info: Help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Margie, Lorrie, Shirley
lender.loan_because: In memory of our mother who was a single, independent woman of wisdom, laughter, and beauty.
lender.occupational_info: Margie teaches African drumming, Lorrie works on government contracts and Shirley is a mortgage lender

lender.name: donna
lender.occupational_info: I provide elderly people with care that they can not give themselves.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: The need is there and so we help.
lender.occupational_info: I love working in a library (25+ years) and watching the world come alive for people. Books are our connection to each other.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself whereby they change their lives for the better.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: I'm changing lives.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Its good!

lender.name: Asma
lender.loan_because: I love to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Hire people for various jobs.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because:
"Whatever affects one directly, affects all indirectly. I can never be what I ought to be until you are what you ought to be. This is the interrelated structure of reality."
Martin Luther King, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: I work on reference books in the social and health sciences.

lender.name: Ron & June
lender.loan_because: We lend to share with others and to build a bond between hard-working people all over the world.

lender.name: sujan
lender.loan_because: I believe that the poor are equally able to employ fiscal responsibility and financial profitability through access to financial services, generally unavailable to the poor. Through microfinance, some may be able to improve the quality of their lives (and of their families)... in hopes to one day pull themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Ryan McRae
lender.loan_because: I love to help people. We have a responsibility to assist those in need.
lender.occupational_info:
I recently graduated from Brandeis University in Massachusetts, with a BA in Politics and Philosophy. I am now a 1L at Suffolk University Law School. I am interested in human rights, civil rights, children's rights, international law, international trade, constitutional law, jurisprudence, and the like.
I am absolutely obsessed with artisanal and craft beer; I run the beer department at one of the highest-ranked beer stores in Massachusetts. I was also recently laid off from my longtime supermarket job, where I was an evening manager and supervisor. I try to loan mostly to individuals in retail, as I know how hard the job can be in comfortable suburban America; I can't imagine how difficult owning and operating a small retail outfit can be in less fortunate parts of this world. I hope I have made a difference.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to share my undeserved privilege with those who are working to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: we have so much in this country and I want to do my part to help those who aren't as advantaged.

lender.name: R, G & I
lender.loan_because: living in the Southwestern US, we see a great need to help build strong economies in our neighboring countries so that people can earn a liveable wage without having to leave their home and without having to risk their lives.

lender.name: Schwartz Family
lender.loan_because: Great friends gave us this great gift to help us teach our children about giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with computers and my spouse helps people with mental illness function in society.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Dale & Lindsay
lender.loan_because: Help is something we all need from time to time in our life. If you can help then give, if you need help then seek.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: As the purse is emptied, the heart is filled. (V. Hugo)

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: Giving some one a hand to help them pull themselves up, helps a whole community.
lender.occupational_info: I make graphic marks that represent people and companies. I also make web sites.

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: I've had the opportunity to travel to many places in the world. With this opportunity comes the knowledge of economic inequalities among the world's people. Once you possess the knowledge that there is something within your power that you can do to help someone in need, you ultimately have the power to make one person's dream a reality. I find that to be amazingly beautiful.
lender.occupational_info: I want to see the places I've only heard about.

lender.name: Scott & Lucy
lender.loan_because: My aunt gave me money for Christmas with a challenge to make a difference in someone else's life. I have made 11 loans with KIVA so far.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 4th grade and I study hard to get straight A's. I love baseball and play first base and pitch.

lender.name: bruce
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give back and to teach people how to make it on their own terms
lender.occupational_info: a smile giver

lender.name: Mayette
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate that I live in a part of the world where life is relatively easy. I have a good life, a good family and a good job. If my small contribution can help better another person's life in another part of the world, then I am happy to do it.

lender.name: Zeke
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student. I don't make too much money. A lot of the money I make I give away, because I know there are a lot of people much worse off than me. The idea of micro loans sounds great. Check out Future Builders (www.future-builders.org), it is an organization I started.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: because I want to help people get out of poverty and help them produce their own food.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3 to 7 year old children and I have a few animals of my own and a big garden.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Helping someone help themselves is the key to changing our world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I used to have a high paying job that I hated, so I quit it and went back to school to learn how to start my own business. I am a bartender when I am not at school at the best restaurant in the area.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach immigrant students from Mexico to speak English.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells skin care goods.

lender.name: Tobi
lender.loan_because: I want to help spread wealth.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I respect entrepreneurs, who try to go out and make something out of nothing--it's inspirational to all, and if I can help them to succeed in their dream, I want to!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an American who has been living in Korea for the past 7 years teaching English. I've taught in various countries and love the diversity the world offers!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to need a break
lender.occupational_info: My research looks at the bad things that happen to the brain if you drink when you are pregnant.

lender.name: Maissa
lender.loan_because: Those who are able must help ones in need.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with dreams and aspirations.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I like to see people support themselves through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teen-aged parents. I help them find resources so that they can be great parents AND finish their education.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I was inspired through my Economics class. I figured, why not? Besides, one can always use some good karma :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student... fairly self explanatory, I would imagine.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because:
When many people who can each do a little come together, great things happen : )
I loan because I am blessed and want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: acting humanly.........

lender.name: Randell
lender.loan_because:
Giving is Awesome!
You are welcome!
lender.occupational_info: Design Computer Networks Invest in Real Estate Love to Surf

lender.name: Dalien
lender.loan_because: Changing the world - bit by bit. Then, byte by byte.
lender.occupational_info: Made just about one useful thing in secondlife, the rest of the time trying to make noise for good causes :-)

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: You can loan the same money again and again. So you help a lot of people with the same dollar.
lender.occupational_info: I work keeping computers safe. I like to bike, program, and eat food with my friends.

lender.name: rita
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: International Consulting

lender.name: X111
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is sustainable. It helps build confidence and retain self respect and dignity.

lender.name: jasmine
lender.loan_because: i want my kids to learn to give
lender.occupational_info: challenging/rewarding

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone deserves a chance at a better life and it's a small gesture to help those that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement information technology security solutions.

lender.name: Terence
lender.loan_because:
Just about US$1 a year you can help someone across the world!!
I loan because I believe that everyone in the world can spend a little effort to help those needed. From accounting point of view, the loan will have a positive spiral effect to the whole community. On the other hand, to me, the loan is recyclable (I can lend to someone later). The opportunity cost is just around a dollar per year for every US25 you lend.
If someone in Hong Kong can make the loan, so are you all over the world!!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Retail Sales, Children's Clothing and Accessories

lender.name: MARA
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure to know that giving so little can help so many realize their dreams.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Providing easy access to capital is a great way to help those in need in developing countries without having them resort to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I write software

lender.name: Lozza
lender.loan_because: I like to help people!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Creating and giving opportunities is the best form of charity.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and people sell things

lender.name: Vishal
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give to struggling individuals in a developing country. Since loans are repaid, the same money can be transferred from one loan recipient to another and another and yet another. It's the gift that keeps on giving! Forever!
lender.occupational_info: I make games.

lender.name: luis
lender.loan_because: I beleave if we can help people to achieve their aims, world will be a better place.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people in other countries help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I was a college professor teaching Biology until I retired.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I am part of a not for profit group who give talks on living sustainable, fulfilling, socially just lives, so donating in this way is walking the walk as well as talking the talk!
lender.occupational_info: To understand my voluntary work go to www.changingthedream.org.au

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Alexandra Camacho
lender.loan_because: I believe some small changes do change the world for better!!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Self sufficient people are the most apt to stay free.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, formerly self-employed... more or less.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I can So easy to make my lunch instead of buying out allows me the opportunity to help

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to support entrepeneurs!

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the best life possible

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: giving is an important values model which inspires others to give. The multiplier effect from giving (and the role model of giving) is immeasurable. Also, I feel a sense of responsibility to help others who are in need and working their way through it.
lender.occupational_info: I keep children safe so that their role models may have the greatest positive impact and influence on shaping character.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others achieve their maximum potential & success! This is something I have a passion for and the joy of doing every day for my private clients. Through Kiva, I can reach people who would have never received assistance. I am so proud of all the entrepreneurs who are claiming success! Thanks Kiva & all the lenders around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mentor, speaker and facilitator to women from over 34 countries (focus 30 - 45 & Baby Boomers). I also mentor for chlidren & youth to help them harness the power of creativity, imagination and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their computer problems.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that the western world can get money straight to those who really need it
lender.occupational_info: I run an estate agency in France with my business partner Kate (also a Kiva lender - she got me started!). We have had to battle the system a bit here to set up our business and we have now opened our second office, so we like the fact that we can give to other small businesses

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's the very least I can do for those who are determined to overcome their current situation.

lender.name: birthe
lender.loan_because: if you help the mother, you help the family.
lender.occupational_info: i have been a kindergarden teacher for 35 years, ret. now.

lender.name: Hamilton
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching a person to fish rather than giving the person a fish. I also admire these people who have taken the initiative to improve their lot in life instead of waiting for hand out.
lender.occupational_info: As a professional I manage a lot of people from all walks of life. I take pride in "leading" as opposed to pushing those whom I manage.

lender.name: Niklas
lender.loan_because: To sit down and wish for things to happen is not an option anymore.
lender.occupational_info: I am sterilizing medical supplies by the use of electron beams.

lender.name: Gabriella
lender.loan_because: the feeling of being able to give to someone, and help someone trying to do something meaningfull is undescribable. Even with such small amounts as $25!
lender.occupational_info: I am a 3rd grade techer. I think teaching is the internationally most wellknown and familiar occupation. We're everywhere! Besides teaching children to read and write I try to prepare them for the community they're going to live and hopefully prosper in.

lender.name: tanisha
lender.loan_because: i wanna give and get that satisfaction i get in me when i can help in return

lender.name: Ylva
lender.loan_because: I think this is a perfect way to help others!

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: Because I have the possibility to do so.

lender.name: Ulrika Linder
lender.loan_because:
I believe in self-empowerment, and in everybody's ability to create something positive for themselves. With belief in what we are doing and a helping hand, we can all improve our own life situations. It does not matter what kind of background we have or where we live.
Micro financing is inspiring! It is a way to help people that might otherwise not have been allowed to borrow money improve their situation and create a better life for themselves and their families.
All anyone ever wants in life is an opportunity. Everybody deserves to get just that.
lender.occupational_info: ... with a passion for creative writing.

lender.name: Yvonne & Stephan
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ideas ever!

lender.name: Campus Kjeller AS
lender.loan_because: we believe encouraging and supporting entrepeneurs and innovation initiatives will make the world a better place for all of us. We hope that other organizations that work with entrepeneurs will join us in our efforts..
lender.occupational_info:
Campus Kjeller AS is a Norwegian Technology Commercialization Office and Business Incubator located in the Kjeller Technology Park outside Oslo.
Our mission is to initiate and drive the commercialization process of research ideas and technology based companies within areas such as renewable energy, environmental technology and societal safety.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Kiva is hot!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I can share with others who are willing to work hard to improve their lives and the lives of people in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I was a Science Teacher who worked in a rural high school in Canada. Now, I help run a library of science teaching ideas (www.stao.org) to help others teach science to young people around the world.

lender.name: Cori
lender.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to be able to provide assistance to an individual as opposed to an organization at large, and to know specifically how your assistance will help them. It feels less anonymous than other kinds of aid.
lender.occupational_info: I turned my passion into a business. I love horses, and my own experiences trying to find saddles that fit me and my horses well led to the creation of my own business selling saddles. I help people in find saddles that fit horse and rider well. My website focuses on saddles for hunter/jumper riders.

lender.name: Ben
lender.occupational_info: I work project managing the building of schools across the city of Birmingham.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It´s a great opportunity to be able to help someone in need, across the globe, to a better life.

lender.name: Matsonian
lender.loan_because: I am devoted to helping others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I think of ideas and work hard and long at turning them into successful businesses.

lender.name: TRACEY
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the planet. Also, it is amazing when someone beleives in you, empowering. It makes me feel great knowing I can help someone to feel that way - better themselves and most of the time, their community.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a network administrator for a community bank in northern Michigan.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a major University.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: It seems like an effective way to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: ...it helps alleviate my "First World" guilt. I travel a lot, often to countries serviced by Kiva, and want to help in a more enduring way than by buying tourist trinkets I don't really want.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: RAY
lender.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN READING A BOOK CALLED "BITTER CHOCOLATE" BY CAROL OFF, WHICH RECORDS THE PLIGHT OF ADULTS AND CHILDREN WHO ARE FORCED INTO SLAVERY OR INDENTURED LABOUR IN AFRICA, TO GROW AND HARVEST COCOA BEANS. MANY OF THEM LEAVE BECAUSE THEY THINK THAT THEY WILL MAKE ENOUGH MONEY TO LOOK AFTER THEIR FAMILIES, BUT THIS IS RARELY , IF EVER , THE CASE. IT MADE ME REALISE HOW EVEN A SMAAL MONETARY CONTRIBUTION CAN MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE IN THE LIVES OF OTHERS. I WOULD LIKE TO PREVENT JUST ONE PERSON OR FAMILY FROM HAVING TO LIVE THIS WAY.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help small businesses in other countries expand and be able to support their families and send their children to school. I like to feel that I'm supporting a means to end poverty by providing an avenue for people to boost their business and help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell supplemental insurance that pays money to families when they go through things like cancer and accidents.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help others who were not born as fortunate as I was.
lender.occupational_info: I manager a group that fixes computers.

lender.name: Axel Manø
lender.loan_because: I believe that what I do makes a difference, and since I have the possibilty to make the world a better place for someone - it's a duty for me.
lender.occupational_info: Im a student of international business
